question.title: Compilation Date
For whom are you filling in this survey?
question.description: Why are we asking this? Flu is thought to spread very effectively at home, so it's important to know which Flusurvey/influweb/grippenet participants live in the same households. How should I answer it? A household member is defined as someone (not necessarily related) who lives at the same address as you and who shares cooking facilites and a living room, sitting room or dining area.

question.title: NOTE: If you are filling in the survey on behalf of someone else, then make sure that you have the consent of that person to do so. Please answer all questions as if you were the person you are filling this in for.
What is your gender?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To find out whether the chance of getting flu is different between men and women.

question.title: What is your date of birth (month and year)?
question.description: Why are we asking this? The chance of getting flu and the risk of more serious complications vary by age.

question.title: What country are you from?
What is the first part of your home postcode (the part before the space)?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To check how representative our sample is, and to see whether the chance of getting flu varies across the country. How should I answer it? Please choose the first part of the post-code (the part before the space).

question.title: What is your main activity?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To check how representative our sample is compared to the population as a whole, and to find out whether the chance of getting flu is different for people in different types of occupation. How should I answer it? Please, tick the box that most closely resembles your main occupation. For pre-school children who don't go to daycare tick the "other" box.

question.title: What is the first part of your school/college/workplace postcode? (Where you spend the majority of your work/study time)
question.description: Why are we asking this? To find out roughly how far you travel on a regular basis. How should I answer it? Please, choose the first part of the post-code (the part before the space).

option.text: Not applicable (e.g. don't have a fixed workplace)

question.title: Which of the following descriptions most closely matches with your main occupation?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To check how representative our sample is compared to the population as a whole and to find out whether the chance of getting flu is different for people in different types of occupation. How should I answer this? Please tick the box that most closely resembles your main occupation.

option.text: Professional (e.g. manager, doctor, teacher, nurse, engineer)
Office work (e.g. admin, finance assistant, receptionist etc)
Retail, sales, catering and hospitality and leisure (e.g. shop assistant, waiter, bar-staff, gym instructor etc)
Skilled manual worker (e.g. mechanic, electrician, technician)
Other manual work (e.g. cleaning, security, driver etc)

question.title: What is the highest level of formal education/qualification that you have?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To check how representative our sample is compared to the population of the UK (Italy, Belgium..) as a whole. How should I answer it? Please choose the box that represents your HIGHEST level of educational achievements. The different option rougly equate to: 1 - no qualifications, 2 - school-leaving exams at around 16 years of age, 3 - school-leaving exams at around 18 years of age, 4 - University degree or equivalent professional qualification, 5 - Higher degree or advanced professional qualification. If you are an adult who is currently undergoing part-time training (e.g. night school) then tick the box that represents your current highest level of education.

option.text: A-levels or equivalent (e.g. Higher, NVQ Level3, BTEC)
Higher Degree or equivalent (e.g. Masters Degree, PGCE, PhD, Medical Doctorate, Advanced Professional Award)

question.title: Except people you meet on public transports, do you have contact with any of the following during the course of a typical day? (Select all options that apply, if any)
question.description: Why are we asking this? To find out whether you are likely to be exposed to more flu than the average person (e.g. work with children, or patients). How should I answer it? Groups of people could include any setting where you come into contact with large numbers of people at one, e.g. a teacher who may contact many children in a day.

option.text: More than 10 children or teenagers over the course of the day
More than 10 people aged over 65 over the course of day
Groups of people (more than 10 individuals at any one time)

question.title: INCLUDING YOU, how many people in each of the following age groups live in your household?
question.description: Why are we asking this? Members of larger households, or those with children, may be more likely to catch flu than the others.

question.title: How many of the children in your household go to school or day-care?
question.description: Why are we asking this? Attending school or day-care may be a risk for acquiring flu and similar illnesses. We would like to check this. How should I answer it? If your child attends regular school or day-care (even this is just one day a week) then please answer yes to this. Attendance of clubs and activities does not count - even if regular.

question.title: What is your main means of transport?
question.description: Why are we asking this? It has been suggested that using public transport may be a risk for flu. We would like to check this. How should I answer it? Tick the option that best represents your most normal mode of transport.

question.title: On a normal day, how much time do you spend on public transport? (Bus, train, tube etc.)
question.description: Why are we asking this? It has been suggested that using public transport may be a risk for getting flu. We would like to check this. How should I answer it? Think of a typical day. If you use several different forms of public transport each day, remember to include all journeys. Don't include taxis or other forms of private transport.

question.title: How often do you have common colds or flu-like diseases?
Did you receive a flu vaccine during the last autumn/winter season? (2011-2012)
question.description: Why are we asking this? We would like to be able to work out how much protection the vaccine gives. We would also like to find out if there is some protection from vaccines received in previous years. How should I answer it? Answer yes if you received the vaccine last year (during the autumn/winter of 2011-12).

question.title: Have you received a flu vaccine this autumn/winter season? (2012-2013)
question.description: Why are we asking this? We would like to be able to work out how much protection the vaccine gives. How should I answer it? Report yes, if you received the vaccine this season, usually in the autumn. If you get vaccinated after filling in this questionnaire, please return to this and update your answer.

question.title: When were you vaccinated against this flu season? (2012-2013)
question.description: Why are we asking this? Knowing when people are vaccinated tells us how well the vaccination programme is being carried out. How should I answer it? Please, try and answer as accurately as possible. If you don't know the precise date, please give your best estimate. For instance, you might remember the month, then try and remember if it was at the beginning or the end of the month. Were there any significant events (e.g. a holiday or a birthday) that might help jog your memory?

question.title: What were your reasons for getting a seasonal influenza vaccination this year? (Select all options that apply)

option.text: I belong to a risk group (e.g, pregnant, over 65, underlying health condition, etc)
Vaccination decreases my risk of getting influenza
Vaccination decreases the risk of spreading influenza to others
It was recommended in my workplace/school
The vaccine was readily available and vaccine administration was convenient
I don't want to miss work/school

question.title: What were your reasons for NOT getting a seasonal influenza vaccination this year? (Select all options that apply)
question.description: Why are we asking this? We would like to know why some people get vaccinated and others do not. How should I answer it? Tick all those reasons that were important in your decision.

option.text: I am planning to be vaccinated, but haven't been yet
I haven't been offered the vaccine
I don't belong to a risk group
It is better to build your own natural immunity against influenza
I doubt that the influenza vaccine is effective
I don't think I am likely to get influenza
I believe that influenza vaccine can cause influenza
I am worried that the vaccine is not safe or will cause illness or other adverse events
The vaccine is not readily available to me
The vaccine is not free of charge
Although my doctor recommended a vaccine, I did not get one

question.title: Do you take regular medication for any of the following medical conditions? (Select all options that apply)
question.description: Why are we asking this? This question allows us to find out whether you have other medical conditions that may increase your risk of having more severe illness if you are infected with flu. How should I answer it? Only answer "yes" if you take regular medication for your medical problem. If, for instance, you only occasionally take an asthma inhaler, then do not answer "yes" for asthma.

option.text: Chronic lung disorder besides asthma e.g. COPD, emphysema, or other disorders that affect your breathing
An immunocompromising condition (e.g. splenectomy, organ transplant, acquired immune deficiency, cancer treatment)

question.title: Are you currently pregnant?
question.description: Why are we asking this? Pregnancy can result in more severe illness if you are infected with flu. How should I answer it? Answer yes if you are pregnant today.

question.title: Which trimester of the pregnancy are you in?
question.description: Why are we asking this? The stage of pregnancy might alter your risk of severe flu if you are infected, although this is not very clear. How should I answer it? Which trimester are you in today?

question.title: Do you smoke tobacco?
question.description: Why are we asking this? Smoking might make you more likely to get a more severe dose of flu. We would like to test this. How should I answer this? Please, answer as accurately as possible. If you smoke other products (e.g. pipe or cigars), then indicate roughly how many times a day.

option.text: Yes, daily, fewer than 10 times a day
Yes, daily, 10 or more times a day

question.title: Do you have one of the following allergies that can cause respiratory symptoms? (Select all options that apply)
question.description: Why are we asking this? Some allergic reactions can have similar symptoms to respiratory infections. How should I answer it? Tick all the options that apply. We are only interested in those allergies that cause respiratory symptoms (i.e. sneezing, sunny nose, runny eyes).

option.text: Allergy against domestic animals or pets
Other allergies that cause respiratory symptoms (e.g. sneezing, runny eyes)
I do not have an allergy that causes respiratory symptoms

question.title: Do you follow a special diet? (Select all options that apply)
Do you have pets at home? (Select all options that apply)

option.text: Yes, one ore more other animals

question.title: Where did you first hear about the flusurvey?

option.text: In the newspaper or in a magazine
Via an internet site (search engine or link)

question.title: Per chi stai compilando questo questionario?
question.description:
Perch questa domanda?

Gli esperti ritengono che l'influenza si trasmetta molto facilmente all'interno dei nuclei familiari, per questo motivo importante sapere quali partecipanti a Influweb vivono insieme. Come devi rispondere? Un membro del nucleo familiare qualcuno (senza che abbia necessariamente un legame di parentela) che vive al tuo stesso indirizzo e condivide la cucina e gli altri spazi abitativi.

question.title: Adesione Q1
question.description: Sesso:

question.title: Adesione Q2
question.description: Mese ed anno di nascita:

question.title: Adesione Q3
question.description: Qual il Codice Postale della zona in cui vivi?

question.title: Adesione Q4
question.description: Qual la tua attivit principale?

question.title: Adesione Q4c
question.description: Quale tra le seguenti definizioni si descrive meglio la tua attivit lavorativa?

question.title: Adesione Q4d
question.description: Qual il livello pi alto di educazione/qualificazione che possiedi? Se sei ancora in formazione, ti preghiamo di segnare la casella corrispondente al livello di educazione pi alto che hai gi raggiunto.

question.title: Adesione Q5
question.description: Nella tua vita quotidiana, ti capita di entrare in contatto con uno dei seguenti gruppi di persone? (Indica tutte le voci appropriate, salta la domanda se nessuna opzione si applica al tuo caso)

question.title: Adesione Q6
question.description: Includendo te stesso/a, quante persone, per ciascuno dei gruppi di eta' indicati, vivono nel tuo nucleo familiare?

question.title: Adesione Q6b
question.description: Quanti dei bambini tra 0 e 4 anni vanno a scuola o all'asilo?

question.title: Adesione Q7
question.description: Qual e' il tuo principale mezzo di trasporto?

question.title: Adesione Q7b
question.description: In un giorno normale, quanto tempo passi sui mezzi pubblici? (bus, treno, metro, etc.)

question.title: Adesione Q8
question.description: Quanto spesso ti ammali di raffreddore o influenza?

question.title: Adesione Q9
question.description: Hai ricevuto la vaccinazione contro l'influenza per lo scorso autunno/inverno (2010-2011)?

question.title: Adesione Q10
question.description: Hai ricevuto la vaccinazione contro l'influenza per questa stagione autunno/inverno (2011-12)?

question.title: Adesione Q10b
question.description: Quando hai ricevuto la vaccinazione per questa stagione?

question.title: Adesione Q10c
question.description: Per quale motivo hai ricevuto la vaccinazione? (Seleziona tutte le opzioni che si applicano al tuo caso).

question.title: Adesione Q10d
question.description: Per quale motivo non hai ricevuto la vaccinazione quest'anno? (Seleziona tutte le opzioni che si applicano al tuo caso).

question.title: Adesione Q11
question.description: Assumi regolarmente farmaci per una delle seguenti condizioni mediche? (Seleziona tutte le opzioni che si applicano al tuo caso).

question.title: Adesione Q12
question.description: Sei attualmente in gravidanza?

question.title: Adesione Q12b
question.description: In quale trimestre della gravidanza ti trovi?

question.title: Adesione Q13
question.description: Sei un fumatore/fumatrice?

question.title: Adesione Q14
question.description: Sei affetto da una delle seguenti allergie che possono causare sintomi respiratori? (Seleziona tutte le opzioni che si applicano al tuo caso).

question.title: Adesione Q15
question.description: Segui un regime alimentare speciale? (Seleziona tutte le opzioni che si applicano al tuo caso).

question.title: Adesione Q16
question.description: Possiedi animali domestici?

option.text: Un membro del mio nucleo familiare
Lavoratore autonomo (libero professionista, commerciante, contadino, etc.)
Studente (scuola dell'obbligo, scuola superiore, universit, etc.)
Congedo a lungo termine dall'attivit lavorativa (per maternit/paternit, malattia, etc.)
Professionista (es. manager, medico, insegnante, infermiera, ingegnere, etc.)
Lavoro d'ufficio (es. amministratore, assistente finanziario, segretaria etc.)
Vendita al dettaglio, ristorazione ospitalit e tempo libero (es. commesso di negozio, cameriere, barista, istruttore di palestra etc.)
Lavoratore manuale specializzato (es. meccanico, elettricista, tecnico, etc.)
Lavoratore manuale di altro tipo (es. addetto alle pulizie, addetto alla sicurezza, autista, etc.)
Diploma di laurea magistrale o titolo di studio superiore (Ph.D.)
Gruppi (pi di 10) di bambini o adolescenti (minori di 18 anni)
Gruppi (piu' di 10) di persone di eta' superiore a 65 anni?
Grandi quantita' di persone (piu' di 10 per volta)
Appartengo ad una categoria a rischio (es. in gravidanza, over 65, condizione di salute pregressa etc)
Il vaccino diminuisce il rischio di prendere l'influenza
Il vaccino diminuisce il rischio di contagio per gli altri
Mi e' stato raccomandato sul lavoro/a scuola
Il vaccino era facilmente reperibile e facile da somministrare
Non voglio perdere giorni di lavoro/scuola
Ho intenzione di vaccinarmi ma non l'ho ancora fatto
Non mi e' stato offerto di vaccinarmi
Non appartengo ad alcuna categoria a rischio
E' meglio costruire le proprie difese immunitarie in modo naturale
Ho dei dubbi sull'efficacia del vaccino
L'influenza e' una malattia di minore importanza
Non credo che mi ammalero' di influenza
Ritengo che il vaccino possa causare l'influenza
Ho timore che il vaccino non sia sicuro o possa causare malattie
Il vaccino non era facilmente reperibile
Nonostante le raccomandazioni del mio dottore, non ho ricevuto la vaccinazione
Immunosoppressione (dovuta a splenectomia, trapianto d'organo, immunodeficienza acquisita, trattamento anti cancro, etc)
Si, quotidianamente, meno di dieci sigarette
Si, quotidianamente, piu' di dieci sigarette
Allergia al pelo di animali domestici
Altre allergie che causano sintomi respiratori (es. occhi arrossati e lacrimevoli)
Non ho allergie che causano sintomi respiratori
Si, uno o piu' animali di altro tipo

question.title: Wie wilt u aanmelden als griepmeter?
Opmerking
question.description: Vul a.u.b. de volgende vragen in uit naam van deze persoon:

question.title: Wat is uw geslacht?
Wat is uw geboortedatum? (MM/JJJJ)
question.description: (Selecteer de maand en het jaar.)

question.title: Wat zijn de vier cijfers van uw postcode?
Wat is uw voornaamste bezigheid overdag?
question.description: (En antwoord mogelijk.)

question.title: Wat zijn de eerste vier cijfers van de postcode van uw werkplek/school/universiteit?
question.description: (Waar u de meeste tijd doorbrengt.)

question.title: Welke omschrijving past het best bij uw dagelijkse werkzaamheden?
Wat is uw hoogst genoten opleiding?
question.description: (Opties voor respectievelijk Nederland/Belgi. Meer antwoorden mogelijk.)

question.title: Heeft u tijdens een normale dag contact met
question.description: (meerdere antwoorden mogelijk):

question.title: INCLUSIEF UZELF, hoeveel personen van de onderstaande leeftijdsgroepen wonen er in uw huishouden?
Hoeveel kinderen in de leeftijd van 0 tot en met 4 jaar uit uw huishouden gaan naar school of naar de dagopvang?
Hoe verplaatst u zich meestal?
Hoeveel tijd brengt u op een normale dag door in het openbaar vervoer?
question.description: (bus, trein, metro, tram, enz.)

question.title: Hoe vaak heeft u last van verkoudheid of griepachtige verschijnselen?
Heeft u vorig seizoen een griepprik gehaald?
Heeft u een griepprik gehaald voor het komende seizoen?
Wanneer bent u voor dit seizoen gevaccineerd tegen de griep?
Wat waren voor u de belangrijkste redenen om dit jaar een griepprik te halen?
question.description: (Meerdere antwoorden mogelijk.)

question.title: Wat waren voor u de belangrijkste redenen om dit jaar geen griepprik te halen?
question.description: (Meerdere antwoorden mogelijk.)

question.title: Gebruikt u medicatie voor een van de volgende aandoeningen?
question.description: (Meerdere antwoorden mogelijk.)

question.title: Bent u momenteel zwanger?
In welk trimester van de zwangerschap bent u?
Rookt u?
Heeft u een of meer van de volgende allergien?
question.description: (Meerdere antwoorden mogelijk.)

question.title: Volgt u een specifiek dieet?
question.description: (Meerdere antwoorden mogelijk.)

question.title: Heeft u huisdieren?
question.description: (Meerder antwoorden mogelijk.)

question.title: Waar heeft u voor het eerst van de Grote Griepmeting gehoord?

option.text: Ik ben thuis vanwege langdurige ziekte of zwangerschapsverlof
Niet van toepassing/ik heb geen vaste werkplek
Ik heb geen officile diplomas of alleen lager onderwijs
NL: Mavo of vmbo / BE: lager secundair onderwijs
NL: Havo, vwo of MBO / BE: hoger secundair onderwijs
NL: HBO of WO bachelor / BE: niet universitair onderwijs (professionele bachelor, academische bachelor of master aan hogeschool)
NL: WO master/PhD (doctor) / BE: universitair onderwijs (academische bachelor en master aan universiteit)
Ik ben nog bezig met een opleiding
Meer dan 10 mensen van 65 jaar of ouder
Geen van bovenstaande antwoorden is van toepassing
Met het openbaar vervoer (bus, trein, metro, tram, enz.)
Ik ga normaal gesproken niet met het openbaar vervoer
Ik behoor tot een risicogroep (zwanger, 60 jaar of ouder, chronische ziekte)
Vaccinatie voorkomt dat ik zelf griep krijg
Vaccinatie voorkomt dat ik het griepvirus verspreid naar andere mensen
Mijn huisarts heeft me de griepprik aangeraden
De griepprik werd aangeraden op mijn werk/op school
De griepprik is voor mij makkelijk beschikbaar
Ik wil deze winter geen werk/school missen
Ik wil de griepprik gaan halen, maar heb dat nog niet gedaan
De griepprik is mij niet aangeboden
Ik behoor niet tot een risicogroep
Ik vind het beter om een natuurlijke afweer tegen het griepvirus op te bouwen
Ik heb twijfels over de werkzaamheid van de griepprik
Ik denk dat ik maar een kleine kans heb om dit jaar griep te krijgen
Ik geloof dat de griepprik juist griep veroorzaakt
Ik ben bang dat het vaccin niet veilig is en dat ik last zal krijgen van bijwerkingen
Ik hou er niet van om gevaccineerd te worden
De griepprik is voor mij niet makkelijk beschikbaar
De griepprik is voor mij niet gratis
Hoewel mijn huisarts de griepprik heeft aangeraden, ben ik die toch niet gaan halen
Ja, voor een verzwakte afweer (bijvoorbeeld door een auto-immuunziekte, kankerbehandeling of na een orgaantransplantatie)
Dat weet ik niet/wil ik niet zeggen
Eerste trimester (tussen de 1 en 12 weken zwanger)
Tweede trimester (tussen de 13 en 28 weken zwanger)
Derde trimester (vanaf 29 weken zwanger tot de geboorte)
Dat weet ik niet/wil ik niet zeggen
Dagelijks, maar wel minder dan 10 keer per dag
Dagelijks, 10 keer of vaker per dag
Dat weet ik niet/wil ik niet zeggen
Een andere allergie waarvan ik verkoudheidsklachten (loopneus, tranende ogen) krijg
Nee, ik heb geen allergie waarvan ik verkoudheidsklachten krijg
Ja, n of meer andere dieren
Door de poster van het project
